segments.text: I need to copy a document immediately .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a copy machine in our computer lab , located on the first floor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! How much is it for a copy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The price per copy is ten cents .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds reasonable . I'll be down there immediately .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There shouldn't be any long lines , sir .
segments.speaker: S2
